// 08/29/25
// sevensegment display contols and logic
// Format: num[3:0]seg[6:0] (11 bits total)
// 0 = segment ON, 1 = segment OFF
00001000000
00011111001
00100100100
00110110000
01000011001
01010010010
01100000010
01111111000
10000000000
10010010000
10100001000
10110000011
11001000110
11010100001
11100000110
11110001110
